wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Owen Jervis (born 9 June 1996) is a British swimmer, from Resolven in South Wales. He competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event at the 2017 World Aquatics Championships. At the 2018 Commonwealth Games, competing for Wales, he won the silver medal in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event.
